name: Superbia
description: A gleaming cyberpunk metropolis where technology and demon contracts intertwine. Citizens wield cybernetic power to summon and control demons as status symbols.

name: Gula
description: A ritualistic shrine city that maintains peace with demons through sacrifice. Humans live under strict laws, offering tributes during every full moon to keep harmony.

name: Acedia
description: A false paradise ruled by elegant demons who keep humans as pampered pets. Comfort is abundant, but freedom is an illusion under gilded servitude.

name: Ira
description: A scorched wasteland of eternal conflict. The strong consume demon blood to gain strength, fighting endlessly to survive in a world where power defines worth.

name: Invidia
description: A frozen frontier divided between native shamans and militaristic researchers. Ancient rituals and human experimentation clash in a battle for forbidden knowledge.

name: Luxuria
description: A gothic kingdom of witches and sorcerers who embrace demons as divine partners. Power and desire merge into dark elegance where blood magic is revered.
